title: Chroma Koi Nami Unselectable
body: I can't select the Chroma skin in ranked or in the custom, anyone else?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently investigating this issue. Did you immediately hop into a queue after purchasing the content? Have you tried logging out and logging back in?

Hey Katey thanks for the reply!

It is working now, I'm sure you know why more than I do ^_^ thanks for the quick resolution. If it helps yes I had tried logging out.
